tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable due to an unsafe default value for the `SSL Insecure` parameter, which disables server certificate verification during SAML assertion workflows. This can expose applications to man-in-the-middle attacks. The parameter should default to false to ensure secure SSL connections.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `software.amazon.jdbc:aws-advanced-jdbc-wrapper` library to the patch version and/or set `sslInsecure` to false.
